text.div:
Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis Antigen in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Latex Agglutination)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    17324-5 Neisseria meningitidis Ag [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    17333-6 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup w135 Ag [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Latex agglutination
    19133-8 Neisseria meningitidis serogroups A+C+w135+Y Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    19134-6 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B+Escherichia coli K1 Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    33397-1 Neisseria meningitidis serogroups A+C+w135+Y Ag [Presence] in Serum by Latex agglutination
    33400-3 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B+Escherichia coli K1 Ag [Presence] in Serum by Latex agglutination
    59421-8 Neisseria meningitidis serogroups A+B+C+w135+Y Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    6494-9 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    6498-0 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    6500-3 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup C Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    6505-2 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup Y Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    6507-8 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup w135 Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
